text: Tony Amendola (born August 24, 1944) is an American actor. He is best known for playing the Jaffa master Bra'tac in Stargate SG-1. Amendola is also known for his recurring role as revolutionary leader Edouard Kagame of Liber8 in the television show Continuum. ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New Haven, Connecticut
title: Tony Amendola
